Module core.java.helper
Package com.pineframework.core.helper

Class JsonUtils

java.lang.Object
com.pineframework.core.helper.JsonUtils
public final class JsonUtils extends Object
The JsonUtils class provides utility functions for JSON data structures.
  • toMap(String)
  • readArray(String, String, Class)
  • readArray(File, String, Class)
  • getNode(String, String, Class)

    • contain

      public static boolean contain(String jsonString, String fieldName)
      The contain method checks is a JSON string included a field. It returns true if JSON string is included the field otherwise returns false.
      Parameters:
      jsonString - JSON as a string
      fieldName - name of JSON field
      Returns:
      boolean.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or empty

    • isConvertible

      public static String toJsonString(Object obj)

      Returns:

    • toJsonString

      public static String toJsonString(Object obj, Class<?> view)
      The toJsonString method converts a java object to the JSON string with specific view.
      Parameters:
      obj - Object, java object
      view - JsonView, JSON view
      Returns:
      JSON as a string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or empty
